name: Sir Squidalot's Grand Montreal Crusade
description:
You are Sir Squidalot, an adventurous knight with morphing powers, and you are in a hazardous mission to access the Montreal Metro.

This game jam was made for DTGMA-I.

Controls
[left, right] Move
[up, down] Morph
[space] Switch Gravity Direction
[mouse click] Set Character Face
[r] Reset Level
[-, +] Zoom
[escape] Pause

Credits (2012)
technobeanie - Game Design, Programming & Music
Boum - Art
Dom2D - Logo & UI
